label: uncl3083
comment: Code specifying a class of organisation.

values.label: Internal medicine
values.comment: Medical speciality concerned with diagnosis and treatment of diseases and conditions, which normally do not require surgery.

values.label: Surgery
values.comment: Medical speciality concerned with diagnosis and treatment of diseases and conditions, which normally do require surgery.

values.label: Psychiatry
values.comment: Medical speciality concerned with diagnosis and treatment of diseases and conditions of the mind.

values.label: General medicine
values.comment: Medical speciality covering all general areas of medicine.
